entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Orangeville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:58 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mono Centre 03:00 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
Temperature: -9.9°C

Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -12.5°C
Wind: WNW 27 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls late this evening and overnight. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 5:51 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls early in the morning. Local blowing snow early in the morning. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:51 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 5:51 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
